title: 108_hr1257
content: The "Selected Reserve Home Loan Equity Act" amends housing loan provisions for members of the Selected Reserve and active duty veterans by removing a specific end date and adjusting loan guaranty fees. The loan fee table shows the fees for different types of loans for veterans and other obligors. The fees vary depending on the type of loan and when it was closed. The loan fee table displays fees for various types of loans for veterans and other obligors, varying based on loan type and closing date. Subsequent loans under section 3710(a) for purchasing or constructing a dwelling with 0-down have different fees based on closing dates before October 1, 2011, between October 1, 2011 and October 1, 2013, and on or after October 1, 2013. The loan fee table outlines fees for different types of loans under section 3710(a) for purchasing or constructing a dwelling with varying down payment percentages and closing dates. The table shows loan fees for different types of loans under sections 3710(a), 3711, and 3712 for purchasing or constructing a dwelling, including interest rate reduction refinancing loans and manufactured home loans. Loan fees for different types of loans under sections 3762, 3714, and 3733(a) range from 0.50 to 2.25. The term 'veteran' is redefined in the section, and subparagraphs are reorganized. The bill was passed by the House of Representatives on May 21, 2003.
